knimeNode.name: Labeling to String based Labeling
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a labeling to a String based labeling. String based labeling means, that all labels in this labeling are considered as Strings. This may be useful as a pre-processing node, e.g. if you want to add String labels.

fullDescription.intro: Converts a labeling to a String based labeling. String based labeling means, that all labels in this labeling are considered as Strings. This may be useful as a pre-processing node, e.g. if you want to add String labels.
